divs: Sighting DetailsWhile watching fireworks, my daughter, my wife and myself observed a orange circular light moving from west to east. I observed the light had no strobes or nav lights and made no sound, it also seemed to pulse. When the light was almost directly overhead it slowly faded out.
Summary: Orange light traveling west to east, no sound, strobes or nav lights.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Covington
There were no other sightings in Covington on or around July 4th 2010
